data.title: Famous People Born in 1941
data.meta_description: Celebrate the birthdays of 914 famous people, historical figures and celebrities born in 1941 like Bob Dylan, Pete Rose and Otis Redding.
data.text:
Birthdays 1 - 200 of 914
